item.title: 韩国为何禁止卖空，何时能解禁？
item.description: 在韩国，监管机构延长了对卖空借入股票行为的禁令，卖空者正面临热议。监管机构的目标是阻止大型投资银行从事可能削弱公众对市场信任的非法交易行为。虽然韩国股市在 11 月禁令实施后出现反弹，但涨势很快就消退了。批评者说，这降低了市场的透明度，也降低了对全球投资者的吸引力。【原文：Short sellers are facing the heat in South Korea after regulators extended a ban on the practice of selling borrowed shares. Their goal is to stop big investment banks engaging in illicit trading practices that could erode public trust in markets. While South Korean shares rallied after the ban was imposed in November, the gains soon faded. Critics said it makes the market less transparent, and less attractive to global investors.】

item.title: 希腊总理准备限制希腊最受欢迎岛屿的游轮数量
item.description: 希腊总理基里亚科斯-米佐塔基斯（Kyriakos Mitsotakis）表示，现在是时候限制游轮造访希腊最受欢迎的岛屿了，这是政府在疫情过后应对 "过度旅游 "影响的第一个举措。【原文：Prime Minister Kyriakos Mitsotakis said the time has come to place restrictions on cruise ships visiting Greece’s most popular islands, the government’s first move to cope with the effects of “over-tourism” in the post-pandemic period.】

item.title: 德根 "加密货币交易员的日常工作
item.description:
如何利用数字货币赚大钱和赔大钱。【原文：

How to make and lose a fortune with digital money.

】

item.title: 电动汽车关税是欧中贸易紧张局势的最新表现：时间表
item.description: 欧盟宣布对中国制造的电动汽车征收关税，引发了人们对贸易战可能爆发的担忧。【原文：The European Union has announced tariffs on China-made electric vehicles, raising concerns that a trade war could break out.】

item.title: 埃及利用液化天然气市场缓解酷暑影响
item.description: 埃及计划购买多年来最大规模的液化天然气，以加大力度缓解夏季酷热带来的能源短缺问题。【原文：Egypt plans to make its biggest purchase of liquefied natural gas in years as it steps up efforts to ease energy shortages amid extreme summer heat.】

item.title: 摩根大通认为波动性上升导致套利交易失去吸引力
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The appeal of currency carry trades may wane in the long term due to increased volatility and the prospect of a dovish turn by the Federal Reserve, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 受关税影响，Stellantis 或将部分中国电动汽车产品转移至欧洲
item.description: 如果本周宣布的电动汽车进口关税生效，Stellantis NV 公司将把中国 Leapmotor 公司生产的部分车型的生产转移到欧洲。【原文：Stellantis NV will shift production of some models made by China’s Leapmotor to Europe if tariffs on electric-vehicle imports announced this week go into effect.】

item.title: MUFG 因 "屡次 "滥用客户数据而面临处罚
item.description: 日本证券监察机构称，三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Japan’s securities watchdog said Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s banking arm and its joint brokerage ventures with Morgan Stanley should be penalized after finding they broke firewalls between business units that protect client data.】

item.title: 狩猎数十亿美元的另类资产管理公司交易升温
item.description: 另类资产管理行业的整合步伐正在加快，主要参与者都在维护自己的主导地位并进行扩张。【原文：Consolidation is gathering pace in the alternative asset management industry as major players assert their dominance and expand.】

item.title: 安德洛墨达的加洛说：市场不必担心欧洲的民粹主义者
item.description: Andromeda Capital Management 公司联合创始人阿尔贝托-加洛（Alberto Gallo）认为，欧洲的民粹主义者往往会引发金融市场的无端恐惧，而法国很可能会照搬这一剧本。【原文：European populists tend to provoke unjustified fear in financial markets, and France is likely to play to that script, according to Andromeda Capital Management co-founder Alberto Gallo.】

item.title: 加密货币反弹疑云重重，债券跑赢比特币
item.description: 本季度，股票和债券的回报率高于比特币，这使得加密货币热潮有可能逐渐熄火。【原文：Stocks and bonds have delivered better returns than Bitcoin this quarter, raising the possibility that a crypto boom is running out of steam.】

item.title: 泰国 380 亿美元基金称黄金可抗衡股市疲软
item.description: 泰国政府养老基金期望通过投资黄金、大宗商品和私募股权获得收益，以帮助抵御国内股市的暴跌。【原文：Thailand’s Government Pension Fund is expecting gains from investments in gold, commodities and private equity to help counter a slump in domestic stocks, following a period that’s seen its performance struggle.】

item.title: 挪威征收富人税引发企业反弹不断扩大
item.description: 挪威计划对本国最富有的公民实施限制，这激起了企业家们的反弹，他们警告说，这一措施只会加剧挪威经济对石油和天然气的严重依赖。【原文：Norway’s planned clampdown on the nation’s wealthiest citizens is provoking a backlash from entrepreneurs who warn the measure will just worsen the economy’s heavy dependence on oil and gas.】

item.title: 印度股市恢复平静，与莫迪有关的担忧有所缓解
item.description: 印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪（Narendra Modi）在经过激烈竞选后重新上台，缓解了人们对政策连续性的担忧，从而使衡量印度股市波动性的指标下降了一半以上。【原文：A gauge of volatility in Indian stocks has eased by more than half as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s return to power after a tight race in elections assuaged concerns over policy continuity.】

item.title: 凯德集团将在印度 GIFT 城开展业务
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，凯德置地投资有限公司不久将开始在印度 GIFT 国际金融服务中心运营，帮助其在古吉拉特邦的经济特区为全球客户提供服务。【原文：CapitaLand Investment Ltd. will soon start operating in India’s GIFT International Financial Services Centre, according to people familiar with the matter, helping serve its global clients from the special economic zone in Gujarat.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：乐购称通胀缓解有助于提升英国销售额
住宅建筑商期待已久的英国改革推动大选
item.description: 英国两大政党承诺在 7 月 4 日大选后将住房问题作为优先事项，这对住宅建筑商来说是个好兆头。【原文：Britain’s two main parties have promised to make housing a priority after the country’s general election on July 4, boding well for homebuilders.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 分析师称日元将因债券购买的不确定性而走软
item.description: 分析师和策略师表示，在日本央行未能提供有关其削减债券购买计划的许多细节而令市场失望之后，日元将扩大近期的跌幅。【原文：The yen is set to extend recent losses after the Bank of Japan disappointed the market by failing to provide many details about its plans to cut bond purchases, analysts and strategists said.】

item.title: 泰国证券交易所在市场低迷时挑选外部人士担任总裁
item.description: 在股价暴跌、外国资金外流和企业丑闻的影响下，泰国证券交易所选择了一位局外人来领导该交易所走出五十年来最糟糕的时期之一。【原文：The Stock Exchange of Thailand picked an outsider to lead the bourse out of one of its worst periods in five decades amid a share price slump, an exodus by foreign funds and corporate scandals.】

item.title: 德国试图阻止或减缓欧盟对中国电动汽车征收关税
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，德国政府正在努力阻止欧盟对中国电动汽车征收的新关税生效；或者在无法完全停止征收关税的情况下，至少对其进行软化。【原文：The German government is working to prevent the European Union’s new tariffs on Chinese electric vehicles from coming into force — or at least soften them should a full halt not be possible, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特斯拉和亚马逊扭曲了消费者的健康预测
item.description:
从自由裁量权指数中剔除两位 "神童"，随着劳动力市场的降温，经济前景将变得不那么强劲。【原文：

Take the two Magnificents out of the discretionary index, and the outlook is less robust as the labor market cools.

】

item.title: 美联储在 "长期走高 "的新时代与全球同行出现分歧
item.description: 美联储表示今年将减少降息次数的举动加深了其与已开始宽松政策的同行的分歧。【原文：The Federal Reserve’s move to signal fewer interest-rate cuts this year deepens its divergence from peers who have already begun to ease.】

item.title: 种植三分之一粮食的农民将迎来人工智能革命
item.description:
在马拉维进行的首次测试中，一款人工智能应用程序正在帮助农民治疗猪病，并杀死破坏庄稼的象鼻虫

。【原文：

In its first test in Malawi, an AI app is helping farmers treat pigs and kill weevils that are destroying their crops

】

item.title: 日元下跌，债券期货上涨，原因是日本央行推迟公布购债细节
item.description: 在日本央行表示将减少购债，但推迟到下次政策会议才提供细节之后，日元走软，日本主权债券期货大涨。【原文：The yen weakened and Japanese sovereign bond futures surged after the central bank said it would reduce debt purchases but delayed providing details until its next policy meeting.】

item.title: 日本央行在利率保持稳定的正常化步骤中削减债券购买量
item.description: 日本央行维持基准利率稳定，并表示将在 7 月会议后减少债券购买量，这标志着向政策正常化迈出了关键一步。【原文：The Bank of Japan kept its benchmark interest rate steady and said it will reduce the amount of its bond purchases after its July meeting, marking a key step toward policy normalization.】

item.title: 斯堪尼亚提高电动卡车产量，Northvolt 解决延误问题
item.description: 瑞典卡车制造商斯堪尼亚商用车公司（Scania CV AB）正在加紧生产电动钻机，因为之前推迟的 Northvolt AB 公司的电池已经开始大量运抵其位于索德尔塔列（Sodertalje）的工厂。【原文：Swedish truck maker Scania CV AB is ramping up production of electric rigs now that previously delayed batteries from Northvolt AB have begun arriving in greater numbers at its factory in Sodertalje.】

item.title: 印度市场快讯：阿达尼扩大水泥业务
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets.】

item.title: 美国向马来西亚归还 1MDB 1.56 亿美元挪用资金
item.description: 在东南亚国家向美国当局寻求额外赔偿一个月后，美国司法部表示已向马来西亚返还 1MDB 被挪用的 1.56 亿美元资金。【原文：The US Justice Department said it returned an additional $156 million in misappropriated 1MDB funds to Malaysia, a month after the Southeast Asian nation sought extra compensation from US authorities.】

item.title: MUFG 的经纪业务面临失去更多债券承销业务的风险
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团公司（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.）与摩根士丹利（Morgan Stanley）的投资银行合资企业面临失去更多债券承销交易的风险，因为金融监管机构可能会考虑对该部门共享客户公司非公开信息的行为进行处罚。【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s investment banking venture with Morgan Stanley is at risk of losing more bond underwriting deals as the financial regulators may consider penalizing the unit for sharing non-public information on client companies.】
